title: Patricia Heaton
summary: Patricia Helen Heaton (born March 4, 1958)[1] is an American actress, model and comedian. Popular in highly rated sitcom television, Heaton is best known for her starring roles as Debra Barone in the CBS sitcom Everybody Loves Raymond (1996–2005) as well as Frances "Frankie" Heck on the ABC sitcom The Middle (2009–2018).
